TopicTitle: Kerbin nightside city lights cover whole nightside

Articles.Content:
I have a number of mods installed, and recently I have been having a problem with my game, In the map view on the nightisde of kerbin this happens.

Please could someone help me with this problem.
You should give us a list of addons you have otherwise it is impossible to tell what the problem is.

Converting the citylights texture from tga to png should, IIRC, correct this.

P.S. you're missing the r from ardua in your sig

Edited November 17, 2014 by ObsessedWithKSP

I have the same issue. I replace the textures as suggested and it is good for a while, then all of the sudden these blobby lights happen again. Seems like the lights multiply through the night side and scale down. Don't know what is causing this, but I hope it is fixed for it is awesome when the city lights work.
